titleStmt.title: An epitaph vpon the decease of the worshipfull Lady Mary Ramsey, late wife vnto Sir Thomas Ramsey Knight, sometime Lord Maior and Alderman of the honorable Cittie of London Wherevnto is annexed certaine short epigrams, touching the mortalitie of man. Published by the consent of the executors. Written by N.B.
titleStmt.author: Bourman, Nicholas.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. R[ead] dwelling in Fleet-lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
